original_title: Michael Franti & Spearhead: Live in Sydney
overview: Soulful message-man Michael Franti and his funky hip-hop band, Spearhead, perform live in Sydney, Australia, in this 10-song concert video. Filmed at the Horden Pavillion, Franti and Spearhead deliver many songs from their 2001 album "Stay Human," a striking blend of old-school R&B and soul, hip-hop and thought-provoking messages. Songs include "Pray For Peace," "Every Single Soul," "Feelin' Free" and "Everyone Deserves Music."
title: Michael Franti & Spearhead: Live in Sydney
